content: in this legal case the court has made a final decision to dissolve the communal property between the parties involved one party has been given full ownership of certain real estate properties while the other party has received an undivided share of other properties the court has also ordered one party to compensate the other with a certain amount of money additionally the court has ordered the payment of expenses incurred by an expert witness and the reinstatement of certain assets rent has been ordered to be paid to the heirs of one party the court based its decision on provisions of the civil code and the factual background of the case the court has determined the shares of the coowners and considered the validity of a testamentary legacy a division plan has been prepared taking into account the appraised values of the properties and the requests of the parties the court has identified certain donations made by the deceased and ordered their repayment the costs of the proceedings have been determined and allocated between the parties in the end the judge has made a final ruling in the lawsuit assigning full ownership of a specific property to one party and dividing ownership of another property between the two parties one party has been ordered to pay a certain amount to the other for adjustments and expenses the judge has also ordered the reinstatement of certain benefits and the payment of rent to heirs the costs of the legal proceedings including an experts report and registration fees will be divided between the parties
